customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Default Permissions to Invite Guests
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Setup a new instance and enable Guest Account feature.
  2. Navigate to Permissions tab on System Console and select Edit Permission Scheme.
  3. Check if by default only system admins have permissions to Invite Guests.
inline.expectedResult: • By default, only system admins should have the option to Invite Guests

customFields.Related ticket(s): Guest Accounts: Default permission is such that all users are allowed to invite a guest. It should be only sysadmin by default. — MM-19684
